title: Frontier: stories from white Australia's forgotten war: part one: they must always consider us as enemies 1788-1830
brief_description: Designed for the international market, this is a compilation of the 3 complete episodes screened on television and contained in the collection, with the addition of some footage that wasn’t televised on ABC- the overall effect is somewhat sanitised and apologetic.
